item.name: Auth
item.description: Overview: user signup, login, email verification, and password reset flows.

request.description:
Creates user with role (PATIENT, DOCTOR, DONOR).
Accepts email/password/role; returns 201 on success.

Marks the signup verification code as used.
Receives verification code; returns success or invalid/expired.

response.name: 400 Invalid code

request.description:
Authenticates a user and returns JWT token.
Receives email/password; returns token on success.

Sends 8-digit reset code to email.
Receives email; returns confirmation or user not found.

response.name: 200 Code sent

request.description:
Resets password using code.
Receives email/code/newPassword; returns success or invalid code.

item.name: Organizations
item.description: Overview: organization onboarding, login, profile retrieval, and password reset.

request.description:
Admin creates organization and sends setup code to email.
Accepts name/email/type with optional org_image; returns creation message.

response.name: 201 Created

request.description:
Completes org setup and returns org token.
Receives email/code/password; returns JWT token.

Authenticates organization account.
Receives email/password; returns organization token.

Returns org profile for logged organization.
Needs org token; returns organization data or not found.

Lists active organizations.
No auth; returns array of organizations.

Sends reset code to organization email.
Receives email; returns confirmation.

response.name: 200 Sent

request.description:
Resets organization password with code.
Receives email/code/newPassword; returns confirmation.

item.name: Users
item.description: Overview: authenticated user profile management and admin verification utilities.

request.description:
Returns all users; admin only by controller check.
Needs admin token; returns users array.

Returns logged-in user profile with role-specific data.
Needs token; returns profile or 404.

Updates current user basic fields (email cannot change).
Receives profile fields; returns updated profile.

Updates patient/doctor/donor specific fields per role.
Receives role-specific data; returns updated profile.

response.name: 200 Role updated

request.description:
Uploads profile image to Cloudinary and updates user.
Needs token; accepts single file named profile_image.

Deletes own profile or by admin.
Receives user id param; returns confirmation or 403.

Marks patient as verified.
Needs admin token; returns success or 403.

item.name: Health Guides
item.description: Overview: health guide CRUD, search, and retrieval with translations/files.

request.description:
Returns paginated health guides with translations and files.
Needs login; accepts skip/limit.

formdata.value: {"category_en":"Nutrition","category_ar":"تغذية","title_en":"Healthy Plate","title_ar":"الصحن الصحي","content_en":"Balance carbs and protein...","content_ar":"وازن الكربوهيدرات والبروتين..."}

request.description:
Creates health guide with translations and optional files.
Admin only; accepts form-data translations JSON and files[]

formdata.value: {"category_en":"Wellness","category_ar":"عافية","title_en":"Sleep Hygiene","title_ar":"نظافة النوم","content_en":"Keep a steady schedule","content_ar":"حافظ على جدول نوم ثابت"}

request.description:
Updates translations/files for a guide.
Admin only; requires guide id path param.

Deletes a health guide by id.
Admin only; returns 404 if not found.

Searches guides by title/content/date.
Login required; accepts title/content/date/skip/limit.

item.name: Workshops
item.description: Overview: public workshop listing plus admin CRUD for sessions.

request.description:
Public list of workshops.
No auth; returns workshops ordered by created_at.

Returns single workshop by id.
No auth; returns 404 if missing.

Creates workshop (admin).
Accepts title/description/type/link/location/scheduled_at.

Updates workshop fields (admin).
Requires workshop id; only provided fields changed.

Deletes workshop by id (admin).
Returns 404 if missing.

item.name: Alerts
item.description: Overview: admin-managed alerts plus logged-in retrieval.

request.description:
Returns all alerts.
Requires login; returns alerts array.

Admin creates alert with title/description/type.
Returns created alert data.

response.name: 201 Created

request.description:
Admin updates alert.
Needs id param and all three fields.

response.name: 200 Updated

request.description:
Admin deletes alert by id.
Returns success message.

item.name: Support Groups
item.description: Overview: support group lifecycle, join requests, and membership management.

request.description:
Admin creates support group.
Receives name/description/category; returns id.

Returns all support groups.
Requires login; no pagination.

Lists groups for logged user (with state).
Requires login.

User sends join request to group.
Requires login; returns pending message.

Admin lists pending/approved requests for group.
Returns requester info.

Admin approves or rejects join request.
State must be provided; returns confirmation.

Admin updates group info; at least one field required.
Returns success or validation error.

Admin deletes group by id.
Returns success or error.

item.name: Group Messages
item.description: Overview: messaging within support groups with optional attachments.

request.description:
Sends message to group; file optional.
Requires membership; returns success or membership error.

response.name: 400 Not member

request.description:
Lists messages for group id.
Requires login; returns messages or not found.

response.name: 200 Messages

item.name: Anonymous Messages
item.description: Overview: anonymous messaging, doctor replies, search, and admin deletion.

formdata.value: I need advice about insulin dosage changes.

request.description:
Any logged user sends anonymous message with optional attachment.
Returns messageId.

formdata.value: Please reduce night dose to 8 units.

request.description:
Doctors/admins reply to anonymous message with optional attachment.
Returns replyId or 403.

response.name: 403 Not doctor

request.description:
Paginated list of main messages.
Requires login; returns messages with pagination.

response.name: 200 Messages

request.description:
Gets main message with all replies.
Requires login; returns 404 if not found.

response.name: 200 Conversation

request.description:
Doctors/admins fetch messages without replies.
Returns messages list.

Search messages by content substring.
Requires login; returns matching messages.

response.name: 200 Results

request.description:
Admin deletes message and asset.
Returns success or not found.

item.name: Medical Needs
item.description: Overview: patient/organization medical needs lifecycle and visibility.

request.description:
Lists pending/in-progress medical needs for logged users.
Returns needs array.

Fetch single medical need by id for logged user.
Returns 404 if missing.

Verified patient or organization creates need.
Returns created record; status set to PENDING.

response.name: 400 Patient not verified

request.description:
Patient/org updates status to PENDING or CANCELED.
Requires ownership.

Patient/org updates fields; must own record.
Returns updated data or authorization error.

response.name: 400 Not authorized

request.description:
Patient/org deletes need they own.
Returns success or auth error.

response.name: 400 Not authorized

item.name: Donations
item.description: Overview: donor contributions tied to medical needs and their retrieval.

request.description:
Donor contributes to medical need if status allows.
Returns created donation.

response.name: 400 Exceeds remaining

request.description:
Lists all donations (login required).
Returns array of donations.

Returns donation by id.
Login required; 404 if missing.

Lists donations for specific medical need.
Login required.

item.name: Reservations
item.description: Overview: doctor appointments publishing and patient reservations/updates.

request.description:
Doctor publishes available appointment slot.
Validates time order; returns appointmentId.

response.name: 400 End before start

request.description:
Doctor views own appointments.
Returns appointments list.

Patient books within doctor appointment slot.
Validates overlap and time bounds; returns reservationId.

response.name: 400 Slot booked

request.description:
Patient views own reservations with doctor info.
Returns reservations array.

Doctor views reservations booked on own appointments.
Returns patient info.

Doctor updates reservation status (PENDING/CONFIRMED/COMPLETED/CANCELED).
Must own the appointment.

Doctor sets preference/notes for reservation.
Must own reservation's appointment.

item.name: Documents
item.description: Overview: verification documents upload and admin review/status change.

request.description:
Admin fetches last 4 pending files for verification.
Returns files.

Uploads patient document; doctors path reserved but not implemented.
Requires login; uses field document.

Admin lists all patient/doctor verification files.
Returns files array.

Admin updates document status Pending/Rejected/Approved; auto-verifies user on Approved.
Returns message.

item.name: Translation
item.description: Overview: utility endpoint to translate arbitrary message content.

request.description:
Translates message.content to ar/en via external API.
No auth; requires message.content and targetLang.

item.name: Admin Info
item.description: Overview: admin dashboards for summary metrics and organization control.

request.description:
Admin dashboard summary of counts.
Returns counts of users, organizations, guides, alerts.

Admin lists all organizations including inactive.
Returns organizations array.

Admin deletes organization by id.
Returns success or not found message.
